reasoning: To provide a more comprehensive answer, I need to understand the history of film production. I will start with the early days of cinema and explore the evolution of film production companies and independent producers. I will then move to the present landscape and identify major studios and independent producers who have worked with Natalie Portman. Finally, I will look at emerging trends in film production. This will allow me to extract search terms representing how film production and Natalie Portman's career have evolved over time.
historical_foundation: Early cinema pioneers: Lumière Brothers, Edison
Birth of studio system: Hollywood's Golden Age (1920s-1950s)
Emergence of the producer role: Irving Thalberg
development_milestones: Studio system dominance: Major studios controlling production and distribution (1930s-1960s)
Rise of the independent producer: Packages and "auteur" theory (1950s-1970s)
The Weinstein era: Miramax and independent film boom (1990s)
Digital filmmaking revolution: democratization of production (2000s)
Streaming services: Netflix, Amazon changing production models (2010s-present)
current_landscape: Major studios: Disney, Warner Bros., Universal
Independent production companies: A24, Plan B Entertainment
Streaming platforms: Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV+
Producer power: Kevin Feige (Marvel), Kathleen Kennedy (Lucasfilm)
Celebrity-owned production companies: Appian Way (Leonardo DiCaprio), Hello Sunshine (Reese Witherspoon)
emerging_trends: AI in filmmaking: scriptwriting, visual effects
Virtual production: LED walls, real-time rendering
augmented_query: "Natalie Portman filmography" + "Golden Age Producers" + "Independent Film Boom" + "contemporary film producers" + "Virtual sets"
query: Who produced films starring Natalie Portman?
